ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit

Class HTMLStyler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit.HTMLStyler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSSStyler

    public class HTMLStyler
extends Object
    Creates HTML from source code content. A styler processes source code using a Tokenizer and produces HTML content that displays the code with highlighting, similar to how it would appear in a JSourceCodeEditor. This class will create HTML with inline CSS styles using the style attribute. To create HTML markup that uses CSS classes, see CSSStyler.
    Since:
    2.1

      • styleLine

        public String styleLine(String line,
                        int lineNumber)
        Styles a document incrementally, a line at a time. This allows you obtain individual HTML fragments for each line.
        Parameters:
        line - the text of the line to style
        lineNumber - the line number index (lines must be styled in order)
        Returns:
        the styled HTML
